name: Weiguo Wang (王伟国)
description:
I am currently a Staff Engineer at NIO Technology Planning, working on acoustic sensing for automobiles. I obtained my Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University, advised by [Prof. Yuan He](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/members/YuanHe).
My research interests lie at the intersection of mobile computing, wireless sensing, and communication, with a particular specialization in the field of acoustics. I am enjoying building proof-of-concepts for innovative applications, encompassing both hardware and software aspects.
